Do you wanna lose brain cells? Then CS:GO is the game for you full of retards, autism and the casual 11 year old who drops the n bomb from time to time. This game is amazing and has such a great community, do you like getting kicked for not 1v5ing? Me too... Do you like people throwing and going out of their ways to jump into your molotovs to get you a 7 day cooldown? Me too.. This game is life and the way.
Counter-Strike: Global Offensive the game for your entire family.

Teammates kill me in competitive more than enemies do, hacking is totally ignored until after it happens, and the community is full of toxic morons who don't have the brain capacity to play a game that isn't a first person shooter.

TL;DR Game great, people dumb
